title: High Half-Elf
content: r Illusion: Create an illusory image that distracts nearby creatures, compelling them to investigate.You can remain hidden while casting this spell. Poison Spray: Project a puff of noxious gas that deals 1d12 Poison. Ray of Frost: Call forth a frigid beam of blue-white light. Deals 1d8 Cold and reduces the target's speed by 3m. Shocking Grasp: Lightning springs from your hand. It deals 1d8 Lightning and prevents target taking reactions. True Strike: Divine a character's defences to give you adva
